title: Simulation-Based Integrated Education Program for Strengthening Pharmaceutical Practice Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pharmaceutical theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Establishing a medication preparation/administration environment similar to real-world settings and recreating clinical scenarios through VR

learning_goals: Learners perform patient symptom analysis and drug interaction evaluations in VR simulations with 80% or higher accuracy
Learners create personalized learning plans integrating theory and practical tasks according to construct alignment principles
Learners improve their ability to develop medication treatment plans through three or more formative assessments (standard: 70 points or higher)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
